views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 9, 10 and 11.

ForceTouchSwitcher gives you visual and useful/functional options for disabling or for extending the Switcher on the 3D Touch Gestures.

The Tweak is the porting of my Tweak OrbGestures hosted on my Repository.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

Configure options from Settings.

Credits and Testers are on Preferences Panel.

would be greatly appreciated!

Version 1.1
- Added the Full iOS 11 Compatibility. 
- Added the Label to Add My Repo on Cydia in the Preferences Panel. 
- Added the Label to Donate Me (thanks a lot) in the Preferences Panel.
- Added the Label to Check My Other Tweaks on BigBoss Repository in the Preferences Panel.
- Changes in Prefs Labels.
- Code Improvements.
